title: SOLD N173 Tip O'neil St. Louis SGC Authentic
author: bigfanNY

posts.post_title: SOLD N173 Tip O'neil St. Louis SGC Authentic
posts.post_content: For sale 1888 Old Judge Cabinet of Tip O'neil coming off his Triple Crown winning Season for St. Louis. Featured in many sets of the era Kimbell  Old Judge Brown's champions etc.  Tip was The Best player on one of the Best teams ever to take the field. Extremely scarce card residing in a SGC Authentic case. Sharp image. Damage to back as card looks to have been removed from a scrapbook. While bad for back it protected the Image on front which displays well. Asking SOLD shipped to US. Loading the pictures  I noticed that two scratches on the case apper on image but they are not on the card
